content: What 2006 film, directed by Martin Scorsese, is a remake of the 2002 Hong Kong film "Infernal Affairs"?

The 2006 film directed by Martin Scorsese that is a remake of the 2002 Hong Kong film "Infernal Affairs" is "The Departed." In "The Departed," Scorsese transposes the original story from Hong Kong to Boston, blending elements of crime, drama, and thriller genres. The film features an ensemble cast including Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, and Mark Wahlberg. It received critical acclaim and was a commercial success, winning multiple Academy Awards, including Best Picture.
